content.rendered:
Our immaculate fleet of luxury chauffeur-driven cars is drawn from the world’s finest and most iconic marques, including Jaguar, Mercedes and Lexus.

Our Fleet

Exemplifying comfort, elegance and timeless style, we are proud to showcase our fleet. Each vehicle is owned by us and is rigorously checked and maintained by our in-house engineers – and always presented in a pristine condition. Our global fleet provides the same high-end service and flawless management. We only partner with the most trusted global suppliers – many of which have worked with us for over 30 years.
Models:
Mercedes E Class
(or equivalent)

Passengers:
2-3

Luggage:
2 suitcases + hand luggage

Ideal for:
Airport transfers
City sightseeing tours
Event and conference delegates
Video Tour
Models:
Mercedes S Class
(or equivalent)

Passengers:
2-3

Luggage:
2 suitcases + hand luggage

Ideal for:
Longer journeys, VIP transfers, private jet passengers, rear passenger privacy using integrated rear blinds
Video Tour
Models:
Mercedes V Class
(or equivalent)

Passengers:
7

Luggage:
7 suitcases + hand luggage

Ideal for:
Groups of senior management on financial roadshows, group event transport, conference and event shuttles
Video Tour

Environmental credentials

100% of our Scottish Saloons are hybrid

All single-use plastic bottles have
been replaced with recyclable
‘Cano Water’

We are committed to
sustainability and support Trees for Life, we make quarterly donations to offset our carbon footprint

We have planted 1,202 trees in our corporate grove since 2021
